thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 43 of 61
thread.title: Cooper

author: Cooper
title: Cooper
text: Purchased a few things on SSENSE before, never any problems with sizes, but I recently grabbed a pair of YSL jeans and the fit wasn't working at all. SSENSE set me up with a return label and had the money back in my acct. by the end of the week. I even got phone calls following up with me after my purchases to make sure I was enjoying everything. First class customer service, don't shop online anywhere else. (Accept for the brands they don't have, which is very few)
